entities.name: Tihama Advertising and Public Relations Co.

highlights.highlight: Logo of Tihama Advertising and Public Relations Co. The meeting was canceled as its purpose was no longer relevant. Tihama had planned the ordinary general assembly to vote on dismissing board members Ibrahim Al-Shabib, Sultan Abdul Azim, and Abdulaziz Al-Suwailem, according to data available with Argaam.

data.snippet:
Riyadh – Mubasher: Saudi Electricity Company (SEC) has signed a $1 billion bilateral Murabaha loan agreement with the Saudi National Bank (SNB).

The funding ...

highlights.highlight: Riyadh – Mubasher: Saudi Electricity Company (SEC) has signed a $1 billion bilateral Murabaha loan agreement with the Saudi National Bank (SNB). The funding deal, which was penned on 7 May 2024, holds a five-year duration period with an option of extension for an additional two years, according to a bourse filing.
